## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G31760](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G31760)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ARI10, ATARI10</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARIADNE 10, ARABIDOPSIS ARIADNE 10
- **Description:**   RING/U-box superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2045223
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_049255]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Homozygous mutant exhibits abnormal floral structures and embryo development.
   - [SALK_049255]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Late flowering.Decreased freezing tolerance.
